thread.title: Award ceremony rewards those behind the racing scene
thread.title_full: Award ceremony rewards those behind the racing scene | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Award ceremony rewards those behind the racing scene
text:
Play video Next week all the men and women across the country will be honoured for the work they do behind the racing scenes at the Godolphin Studs and Stable Awards.
The event takes place on Monday 20th February to reward 'those dedicated, hard-working people' described as the backbone of the industry.
The awards first began in 2005 and this years event will be live streamed for everyone to see.
Penny Silvester has been to meet some of those dedicated workers who've been shortlisted for honours.
Last updated Fri 17 Feb 2017 Sport Essex Buckinghamshire
